description: Fix TypeScript errors in core dashboard components (excluding admin, patients, inventory, appointments)

workstreams.description: Analyze TypeScript errors in core dashboard files
workstreams.findings: TypeScript lib files missing - dependency issue, not code issue

workstreams.description: Fix main dashboard layout and root layout TypeScript errors
Fix dashboard page components TypeScript errors - focused on implicit any types

decisions.decision: Excluding admin, patients, inventory, and appointments subdirectories per user request
Identified root cause: TypeScript lib files missing from node_modules
decisions.rationale: Running npm install to resolve dependency issues before fixing code-level type errors
